name: 猫肉「Cat Meat」
description:
Oh noes! Meteors are raining down and your loved ones are at home alone! Race back to make sure they're safe, but be careful - cats only have 9 lives!

  • Deceptively Cute 16-bit Pixel Art
  • Retro Platforming Action with a Twist - You must complete the game with only 9 lives
  • Great Music by Michael "Music Mike" Ripka
